settings.ekit_heading_title: Answers to {{common questions}} about your stay

tabs.tab_title: What time is check-in and check-out?
tabs.tab_content: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM to ensure rooms are perfectly prepared for your arrival. Check-out is by 11:00 AM, allowing us time to refresh rooms for the next guest's luxurious stay.

tabs.tab_title: Do the rooms include free Wi-Fi?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, all rooms offer complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi to keep you connected throughout your stay, whether you need to work, stream your favorite shows, or stay in touch with friends and family.

tabs.tab_title: Do you offer airport transportation services?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, we offer airport shuttle services to and from the resort for an additional fee. Please contact us in advance to arrange your transportation.

tabs.tab_title: Can I request an extra bed in the room?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, extra beds are available upon request. Please let us know in advance, and we will do our best to accommodate, subject to availability and the room's size restrictions for additional beds.

tabs.tab_title: What are your dining options on-site?
tabs.tab_content: Luxora offers a variety of dining options, including a fine dining restaurant, casual café, poolside bar, and in-room dining for guests’ convenience.

tabs.tab_title: Are pets allowed at the resort?
tabs.tab_content: We welcome small pets in designated rooms. Please contact our front desk for pet-friendly accommodation options and information on additional fees.

tabs.tab_title: What amenities are included in the rooms?
tabs.tab_content: Our rooms feature luxurious bedding, flat-screen TVs, coffee makers, minibars, and stunning views. Some rooms include private balconies, soaking tubs, and more.

tabs.tab_title: Is there a fitness center at the resort?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, we have a fully equipped fitness center that is open 24/7, providing guests with modern equipment and a serene atmosphere to stay fit during their stay.

tabs.tab_title: How do I modify or cancel my reservation?
tabs.tab_content: You can modify or cancel your reservation by contacting our front desk or accessing your booking confirmation online. Cancellation policies vary by reservation type.

tabs.tab_title: Are there activities available for children?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, we offer a kids' club, daily activities, and family-friendly amenities to ensure children have an enjoyable and memorable stay at Luxora.

settings.editor: Have questions about your upcoming stay? Our team is ready to offer expert consultation and tailored suggestions to make your experience exceptional.
